				[1627] image 'Night Vision Innovation', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/5ee63e33-3cf0-42b5-918e-a92822e778b5.__CR0,0,970,300_PT0_SX970_V1___.png'
				[1641] image 'Dark night, clear vision', url='https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/aplus-media-library-service-media/7a2ca4f3-adba-479a-903e-1ad74b1ac44d.__CR0,0,970,300_PT0_SX970_V1___.png'
				[1651] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1654] list ''
					[1655] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText "MORE POWERFUL THAN EVER: Nightfox's flagship unit is the Nightfox Vulpes, a pair of handheld night vision binoculars with a fixed 6x optical magnification and an adjustable 3x digital zoom. With a massive 220 yards of range in the darkness, the Vulpes is an ideal addition to your hunting gear or spy gear setup. Unlike a traditional night vision scope, The Vulpes works both in daylight and at night."
					[1657] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'INTEGRATED LASER RANGEFINDER: Thanks to an integrated Laser Rangefinder showing a real-time distance measurement on the screen, the Vulpes is the ultimate piece of tactical gear. Determine the exact distance of your target - up to 200 yards in optimal conditions - with a click of the button. The live measurement not only displays on the LCD screen but also shows on your captured video recordings. This unique feature makes the Vulpes the ideal pair of binoculars for hunting.'
					[1659] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText "CRYSTAL CLEAR FOOTAGE: The Vulpes boasts a Full High Definition (FHD) infrared camera sensor: 1920*1080p resolution. The night vision camera technology found inside the Vulpes means you'll get excellent quality video footage, all saved onto the included 32GB memory card and easily downloadable to your Mac or PC."
					[1661] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'AUDIO RECORDING: Thanks to an integrated microphone, video footage taken by the Vulpes also includes audio recording - A real innovation for digital night vision goggles like the Vulpes. Capture your complete night vision experience like never before.'
					[1663] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText "ENERGY ALL NIGHT: Two integrated rechargeable batteries totalling 6400mAh capacity give over 6 hours of constant use. With the included micro USB cable, simply plug the Vulpes into any USB port to charge, like a wall socket or a USB power bank. Never be stranded with a flat night vision scope again. If you need a pair of hunting binoculars to keep going all night, the Vulpes won't let you down."

step_data.thought: I have accessed the product page for the Nightfox Vulpes Handheld Digital Night Vision Goggles, and I have identified the relevant dimensions and weight in the product description section. The item dimensions are '7.76 x 5.51 x 2.95 inches' and the item weight is '1.4 Pounds'. I will now summarize this information for the user to fulfill their request.
